DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Entity wanders and randomly approaches and talks to other nearby entities running this same task.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>FriendDistance</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Friend Distance</myLabel> <myToolTip>Maximum distance from entity to query for "friends"</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>50</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>movement</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Restrict to Area</myLabel> <myToolTip>Select to restrict entity movement to the specified area.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>Area</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Area:</myLabel> <myToolTip>If Restrict to Area is selected, the area in which to restrict movement.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>All Overlay and Control Objects</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllOverlayAndControlObjectsFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
